duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and scope out product specs for technology evaluation and product roadmaps.
Design simplified product architecture through the most important technical decisions that define a product and its features for the next 5 to 10 years.
Dive deep on emerging cloud technologies and their applicability to the product portfolio.
Work on the most difficult product architecture issues and work reviews.
Design process improvements for how technical product and engineering teams operate.
Lead and coach the team, setting the quality bar for the work performed.

education_certification.credential: University degree in an Engineering field
